Концепция № 163201
DO NOT SLEEP AT NOON
DO NOT EAT STALE FOODS AND FERMENTED RICE
DO NOT SMOKE CIGARETTES
DO NOT WALK BAREFOOT
FOLLOW DIABETIC FOOD CHART
DO NOT EAT RAW SALT
DIET
DO NOT BATH IN PONDS
DO NOT CHEW TOBACCO
EAT HOT MEALS
EAT FOODS COOKED WITHOUT SALT
STAY NEAT AND CLEAN
DO NOT CLOSE ALL THE DOORS AND WINDOWS WHILE SLEEPING
DRINK LESS WATER
DO NOT EAT RAW ONION
DO NOT EAT RAW ONION, TOMATO, LETTUCE, OR LENTIL
DRINK LOTS OF WATER
DRINK COOLED BOILED DRINKING WATER
WEAR DRY CLOTHES AFTER BATH
DO NOT DO HEAVY WORK
DO NOT BRUSH YOUR TEETH WITH GURAKHU
EAT PLENTY OF GREEN LEAF VEGETABLES AND FRUITS
AVOID OILY AND SPICY FOODS
DO NOT DRINK ALCHOHOL
REVIEW WITH DIAGNOSTIC REPORT
GURGLE WITH LUKEWARM SALINE WATER
DO NOT STUDY IN LOW LIGHT
